transcript.text: long Shalom Shalom it is a day three of

with us behind him on white flying

day we'll

during this one thousand year period we
who were fortunate enough to be

we'll be like the angels and will be

all the martyrs that ever were that fell

will eat
rass like the excuse me the lion will
